attributes.action: Cancel to proposed VED Road tax changes due in 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The end of the britsh car industry is in sight. Land rover, Jaguar, Ford, vauxhall may not be british owned any more but their days are numbered. When in april 2009 the new VED road tax charges come in family cars like the vectra, mondeo will be priced of the road. The government is wrong in these changes especialy in the back dating to 2001.What the government is doing is wrong! under the changes someone can drive a small car with a co2 of 119g 100,000 miles and pay £35 tax while someone in a rural area who has a 4x4 with a co2 of 255g and only covers 3000 will pay £500 in 2009 and £1000 in 2010.
The green issue does not facter in as the small car produces more pollution.
The second hand value of cars is falling faster than houses. new car sales are already at their lowest in years. The fairest way is to abolish road tax altogether and put it on fuel. that way the more you pollute the more you pay.
